Replaces the view with that of {{tt|view}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | view | view to copy}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;experimental/string_view&gt;
int main()
{
    std::experimental::string_view v = "Hello, world";
    v = v.substr(7);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; v &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
world
}}
